main event: A round-shaped, yellow-like object was sighted by the pilots of Capital Airlines Flight 841 over Cleveland, Ohio.
interesting points: The object was observed visually for 8 minutes while the aircraft was flying,The object moved northwest from Cleveland at a high speed,The pilots reported that the object was not a star or a jet and appeared brilliant before dimming and then brightening again,The report indicates that the object hovered before moving quickly out of sight,The conclusion section of the report was left blank, indicating no determination was made about the nature of the object.
sighted object: one round-shaped object, yellow-like in color
